scripts.dev:all: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$docker='C:/Program Files/Docker/Docker/Docker Desktop.exe'; if(-not (Get-Process -Name 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)){ if(Test-Path $docker){ Start-Process -FilePath $docker -WindowStyle Minimized } }; try{ docker image inspect ocrmypdf-local:latest | Out-Null } catch { docker compose -f docker-compose.ocr.yml build }; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoProfile','-Command','npm --prefix backend run dev' -WindowStyle Minimized; npm run dev"
scripts.backend:up: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$docker='C:/Program Files/Docker/Docker/Docker Desktop.exe'; if(-not (Get-Process -Name 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)){ if(Test-Path $docker){ Start-Process -FilePath $docker -WindowStyle Minimized } }; try{ docker image inspect ocrmypdf-local:latest | Out-Null } catch { docker compose -f docker-compose.ocr.yml build }; npm --prefix backend run dev"
